title: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - Ponte Marechal Carmona
title_short: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - Ponte Marechal Carmona
description: Small place for vans and small campers. View of the river. we only stopped for a short lunch break, possibly also overnight. Road / bridge right next to it, therefore slight driving noise. apparently parking for anglers.

title_short: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - Caminho Pedonal Ribeirinho

title_short: (2600-167) Vila Franca de Xira - 235 Rua Doutor Miguel Bombarda

title_short: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - 32 Rua Joaquim Pedro Monteiro

title: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - 12 Rua Bica do Chinelo
title_short: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - 12 Rua Bica do Chinelo
description: Free public parking under the road on several floors. Quiet and not busy. The town is walkable from the car park. We spent a carefree afternoon and night there.

name: Camping
title: (2600) Camping
description: Municipal campsite, associated with the swimming pool. Good stopover after visiting Lisbon. Easy access. The places are not big. Electricity, water, toilets and showers.

title: (2600-209) Vila Franca de Xira - 6 N1
description: Intermarché gas station, with washing machine

title_short: (2600) Alhandra - 44 Rua Dom Tomás de Almeida
description: Merendas Park Dr Sousa Martins. With numerous picnic tables, barbecues and even laundry machines. It consists of a large parking lot that would be good to sleep if it were not for the noise of the National that passes nearby.

title: (2600) - N10
description: Repsol petrol station. Water available at the tire pressure level. Free

title: (2600-490) Alhandra - 8 Calçada da Igreja
description: Free parking with a point of view!

title: (2600-451) Alhandra - 1 Avenida dos Esteiros
description: Right at the Marina de Alhandra, there is a larger parking lot for about 50 regular cars. Not suitable for very long vehicles, ours is about 6 m and that was almost a bit too much. It's a good spot for one night, in order not to disturb the locals too much.

title: (2600) São João dos Montes - 4 Rua Industrias
title_short: (2600) São João dos Montes - 4 Rua Industrias
description: Self service laundry at Intermarche. Prices in the picture.

title_short: (2600-610) Castanheira do Ribatejo - 27 Rua de Padre António Bianchi
description: Quiet parking to spend the night, next to the road touching the urbanization

title: (2600) Alhandra - 115 N10
description: Pleasant public sports field near the road, equipped with a fountain with drinking water. Useful for a quick break

title: (2630) Arruda dos Vinhos -
description: Provides: water; electricity; video surveillance; Facilities: pool access; Wi-Fi; pets allowed. Magnificent sunrise and sunset of the day. Recommend booking in advance. Advisable: maximum 4 pax per unit. Maximum 3 days

title: (2600) Castanheira do Ribatejo - 37 Rua Prudêncio Duarte Correira
title_short: (2600) Castanheira do Ribatejo - 37 Rua Prudêncio Duarte Correira
description: Nice place to rest, have a barbecue. No amenities

title: (2615-367) Alverca do Ribatejo - nº 2 Rua Jorge Maria do Nascimento
title_short: (2615-367) Alverca do Ribatejo - nº 2 Rua Jorge Maria do Nascimento
description: Clean & grey water disposal, Carwash & vacuuming

title: (2615-097) Alverca do Ribatejo - 11 Rua César Augusto Gonçalves Ferreira
title_short: (2615-097) Alverca do Ribatejo - 11 Rua César Augusto Gonçalves Ferreira
description: Enclosure of the park's weekly market. Parking on Saturdays from midnight to 6 p.m. is prohibited. During the day it is calm. Spacious place, good to take a break. There are a lot of shops nearby: restaurants, banks, shops, Lidl, etc ... Could possibly serve as an alternative to visiting Lisbon by public transport, including train.

title: (2615) Alverca do Ribatejo - 129 Rua António Sérgio
title_short: (2615) Alverca do Ribatejo - 129 Rua António Sérgio
description: We stoped for lunch, lovely park alongside. No signs to say you could not overnight. Three other campers were here. Good shade, reasonable flat. Playgrounds for children and adults. Tennis court and picnic tables in the shade

title: (2615) Alverca do Ribatejo - R. Irene Lisboa
title_short: (2615) Alverca do Ribatejo - R. Irene Lisboa
description: Public park. No forbidden signs. Train station next. 15/20 minutes till Lisbon center by train.

title: (2580) Carregado - Quinta de Alconchel
description: Intermarché supermarket of ​​Carregado (on EN 1 between Alenquer and Vila Franca de Xira (Portugal). Ask water lock key (free use) at fuel station nearby.

name: O Torricado
title: (2135) O Torricado
description: Restaurant and cafe with truck parking. We asked to stay the night and they agreed it’s ok. The showers are available.

title: (2135) Samora Correia - 13 Rua dos Operários Agricolas
title_short: (2135) Samora Correia - 13 Rua dos Operários Agricolas
description:
Large parking space close to the cultural center, piscine and cemetery. Calm during the night. Light posts running the whole night.
Nothing special just a easy parking spot for a night.

title: (2630-300) Arruda dos Vinhos - 7 Rua Manuel Silvestre
title_short: (2630-300) Arruda dos Vinhos - 7 Rua Manuel Silvestre
description: Very nice place, well equipped and with a beautiful view of the valley! I recommend !

title: (2135-322) Samora Correia - 144 Rua dos Operários Agrícolas
title_short: (2135-322) Samora Correia - 144 Rua dos Operários Agrícolas
description: LPG station. Easy access, but mind the 2 meter awning. No self-service so check opening hours.

title: (2630-260) Arruda dos Vinhos - 15 Rua Casal da Cruz
title_short: (2630-260) Arruda dos Vinhos - 15 Rua Casal da Cruz
description:
Intermarché parking. Renewed by the commercial establishment. All services are free. On the way to the west side. 1 place service station and 3 places for overnight stay
limit 72 h

title: (2630) Santiago dos Velhos - Forte da Carvalha
title_short: (2630) Santiago dos Velhos - Forte da Carvalha
description: Small parking lot with tables and benches, we slept here one night alone and in silence, next to some castle ruins and a panoramic swing, it can fit 4 large motorhomes

title: (2580-523) Alenquer -
description: Large clean and quiet parking two taps a few trash cans

title: (2625-157) Póvoa de Santa Iria - 52 Rua Afonso de Albuquerque
title_short: (2625-157) Póvoa de Santa Iria - 52 Rua Afonso de Albuquerque
description: Praia dos Pescadores. Location near the Tejo river with plenty of space to park, barbecues, picnic area, showers, plenty of space for children and a cafe. I didn't stay overnight but I'm pretty sure that's fine.

title: (2580) Alenquer - 2 Rua Serpa Pinto
description: Small flat parking area next to a derelict morgue.  100m away from the road. 10 min walk into the village with shops, restaurants and cafe’s.

title: (2580) Alenquer - N9
description: At the edge of the road but quiet, table and barbecue, very good inexpensive restaurant, friendly and French-speaker.

title: (2630) Santiago dos Velhos - 7 Est. Vl. Vedra
title_short: (2630) Santiago dos Velhos - 7 Est. Vl. Vedra
description: Vague land without services at the entrance of a village. Stayed one night without a problem and only the sounds of dogs barking in the village.

title: (2625-705) Vialonga - 6 Rua Amílcar Cabral
description: Laundry, 8kg and 16kg washing machines and dryers, there is a hairdresser and cafeterias very close to have a drink or buy some sweet quiet place with good parking.

title: (2050) Azambuja - Unnamed Road
description: Tables and barbecues available, quiet location on the banks of a tributary of the Taje

title: (2690) Santa Iria de Azoia - Rua Dom Afonso de Albuquerque
title_short: (2690) Santa Iria de Azoia - Rua Dom Afonso de Albuquerque
description: Free service area. Intermarché Sta Iria. Great fresh water quality, clean dump area.

title: (2130) Benavente - N118
description: Lavanteria, wash and dry at intermarche.

title: (2130) Benavente -
description: Nice place just outside of a village and right next to a fairground. Directly on the river with a path that invites you to take a long walk. Plenty of space for several, even larger, mobiles. The place is level. Access should be via the town center. The night was very quiet and lonely.

title: (2130) Benavente - 5 Rua Álvaro Rodrigues de Azevedo
title_short: (2130) Benavente - 5 Rua Álvaro Rodrigues de Azevedo
description: Free Park, could park the motorhome No water or WC. The near station is at Intermarché Benavente 2 km from here

title: (2580) Sobral de Monte Agraço - 3 Estrada de Pereira Palhacana
title_short: (2580) Sobral de Monte Agraço - 3 Estrada de Pereira Palhacana
description: Large car park at the end of the village, equipped with clean toilets, running water, abandoned picnic area, usable barbecue, sink with water, outside water tap which allowed to fill with water. However no possibility of emptying the wastewater. The village bar makes groceries

title: (2590) Forte do Alqueidão - N115
description: Location in the heart of nature. Parking place for visitors to the Lines of Torres Vedras. Dirt road to get here, rutted, but passable to smaller vans, PCVs. Wind turbine close by of that bothers you.

title: (2130) Benavente - N118
description: Nice space next to the ditch with a bar next door.

title: (2050-271) Azambuja - 33 Urbanização Serrado do Barroso
description: Small, quiet car park away from traffic noise located between the arena (praçia de touros) and the gymnasium. Close to the village, near an Aldi supermarket, perfect for a night stopover.

title: (2660) Santo Antão do Tojal -
description: Quiet place near the wind turbines. Only   accessible for small/medium vans. Good 4G Vodafone, Meo and Nos

title: (2590) Sobral de Monte Agraço - 15 Campo da Feira
title_short: (2590) Sobral de Monte Agraço - 15 Campo da Feira
description: New area, all facilities. At the weekend you should not stay overnight because of the adjacent disco.

title: (2120-097) Salvaterra de Magos - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area by the lake, with a river running to the next town. Very quiet. Here you could also spend a quiet night. Please take your rubbish with you as there are no rubbish bins.

title: () Sobral de Monte Agraço - N248
description: Nice little park, trees for shade, quiet, water, barbecue grill, tables, near a supermarket, a little sloped.

title: (2580) - Rua das Carreiras
description: Parking above the village of Ota, beautiful 180 ° view, many picnic tables, a barbecue area and several water taps (2/3 of closed at this time). Ideal for a quiet alte quiet.

title: (2580) - 1 Largo Doutor Mário Madeira
description: Water tap and public toilets in the center of cute tiny town of Ota. Opposite a nice café.

title: (2120-092) Salvaterra de Magos - 201 N118
description: Easy access direct from N 118 main road inside small town, with flat illuminated and free P without shadows and free service area. Picnic tables on bottom. Inside town so several shopping and supermarket around. If you like bullfighting, here is main event; also works with hawks (search “Falcoaria Real”). The area is safe but noisy mainly in working days as just aside main road and also main roundpoint with many trucks traffic. For quiet overnight, choose “Cais da Vala Real” near small marina (1,2 km N top of town).

title: (2670-732) Fanhões - Estrada das Ribas
description:
Place to spend the night next to a park surrounded by nature. The area is level, shaded and silent. The park has many activities in nature for children and adults with zip lines and steps between trees.

Please note: you cannot stay overnight inside the large parking area of the park

title: (2670) Fanhões - Rua da Sociedade Recreativa
description: Several locations available on dirt roads in good condition therefore passable. Set back from the road so very quiet.

title: (2670) Fanhões -
description: Small spot at the top of a plateau. Be careful it climbs hard and with the stones it skids but there is a parking lot at the top with a handicapped place. Quiet night, waking up in the morning with hunters in the distance and a few passages of quads. Nice view, especially at night with the lights of the surrounding towns, despite the wind turbines in the distance.

name: Cais da Vala Real
title: (2120) Cais da Vala Real
description: Flat illuminated free gravel parking at opposite site of small marina and small arm of Tejo river. Quiet for overnight. No shadows. No services.

title: (2670) Lousa -
description: Small spot on the side of the road, quiet! Next to a nice ruined castle to "visit" very quickly! We didn't sleep there, but there was no sign prohibiting it.

title: (2665-307) Milharado - R. Anselmo Manuel Carreira
description: Nice little park to eat! It's clean, there's shade and a small cafe next door if needed.

title: (2120) Salvaterra de Magos -
description: Nice riverside beach, with picnic tables and barbecue spots.

title: (2580) Merceana - Rua dos Bombeiros Voluntários
description: Merceana! Huge, tarred market and parking lot. Pot plane. Annoying dog barking at night.

title: (2590) - 10 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Personal park for 5/6 motorhomes. We have friendly dogs. PLEASE CALL BEFORE ARRIVING.

title: (2670) Lousa - Rua Dom Manuel I
description: Flat land near a point of view. Very nice view around. Warning: very steep access on asphalt road, then arrived at the top we are on a dirt road that is muddy in case of rain. Road downhill so a little noisy.

title: (2665) Milharado - 42 Avenida de Portugal
description: Parking of the public park of Póvoa da galega, right in the middle of the village by the library and close to several stores. ok for a night or two.

title: (2665-335) Milharado - 9 Rua da Ermida
description: Water tank tap (probably no drinking water) with Gardena connection available and toilet on a large square with gas station and bus parking available.

title: (2670) Lousa - Autoestrada do Oeste
description: Rest area of a Repsol gas station. There are 4 large squares, quite well leveled. Perfect for an overnight en route.

title: (2565) Dois Portos - 56 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Fountain with water. Canisters have a lot of space, the water jet is also so that they can be filled quickly. And a small nice café next door.

title: (2565-206) Dois Portos - 67 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Cosy outdoor kitchen with picknick tables, fireplace and a sink combined. toilet as well.

title: (2670-457) Loures - Avenida Descobertas
description:
Next to shopping center.
Nice spot to spend the night.

title: (2050) Aveiras de Cima - 122 Rua do Relógio
title_short: (2050) Aveiras de Cima - 122 Rua do Relógio
description: FREE clean water can be charged. The socket is next to the air, you have to squeeze the black nozzle and the water comes out.

title: (2670) Lousa - IC1
description: Station service avec douche

title: (1990) Lisboa - Rua Chen He
description: Small parking lot next to a skate park, pump track and fitness area. Right under the big bridge. Nice atmosphere right next to a park.

title: (2685-021) Sacavém - 15A Rua José Luís de Morais
title_short: (2685-021) Sacavém - 15A Rua José Luís de Morais
description:
laundry service
dryer

title: (1990-513) Lisboa - n.º 1 Rua Chen He
description: Perfect for visiting Lisbon, spent 3 nights there easily, it's quiet. Good alternative to the parking lot next door under the bridge, where a lot of people hang out at the weekend. Bus stop directly at the parking lot. Completely free on weekday nights and Saturday-Sunday.

title: (1990) Lisboa - Caminho das Cegonhas
description: Paid parking under overpass. Next to skatepark, water tap for drinking at the skatepark. Local make out spot so a lot of coming and going

title: (1990) Sacavém - Passeio do Teja
description: Large parking lot without lines. flat and sunny. we stayed 3 months, it does not bother anyone, we were safe and it's calm. Very close fountain, and garbage cans collected every day. very clean and well maintained park. if you are at the bottom of the parking lot, you can receive the tennis wifi. bus line 708 at the foot of the parking lot to reach the metro. BE CAREFUL for the route, put the roundabout otherwise the gps will take you over the bridge !! by 12m bus KarasGo family route's

title: (1990) Sacavém - Passeio dos Heróis do Mar
title_short: (1990) Sacavém - Passeio dos Heróis do Mar
description: Good spot to land, lots of space for animals, several free parking at the edge of the park.

title: (1990) Sacavém - 46 Rua Príncipe Mónaco
description: I have stayed in this place next to another motorhome. It is a quiet place and close to bus stop.

title: (1990-503) Sacavém - 19 Passeio das Gáveas
description: Authorized parking, quiet and safe place near the police station

title: (1990-385) Lisboa - N10 Passeio dos Jacarandás
description: Good place to spend the night. Very shady. Very quiet bar. Some supermarket nearby. Right next to the Teixo River promenade, where you can picnic, walk, do some exrcise...Riverfront restaurants 10-15 min away on foot.

title: (1990) Lisboa - Travessa Sindbad O Marinheiro
description: Parking between residences. A temporary solution, much quieter than under the bridge to the North. Slight slope

title: (2890) Alcochete - Estrada das Hortas
description: It is an abandoned nature interpretation center. It has utilities and water that can be used. It is a quiet and safe neighborhood. There is a bar next to the water. Do not enter the dirt road high risk of getting stuck.

title: (2890-013) Alcochete - 196 Rua Dona Maria Teresa de Noronha
title_short: (2890-013) Alcochete - 196 Rua Dona Maria Teresa de Noronha
description: Laundry shop with 3 washing machines   3 drying machines. If you buy the client card, you save money. You can park in a big dirt car park very near. Several supermarkets in the area.

address.street: 196 Rua Dona Maria Teresa de Noronha

title: (2890) Alcochete - 599 Avenida Dom Manuel I
description: A quiet place in a parking space near the Tagus with a stunning view of the city of Lisbon and the Vasco da Gama bridge

title: (2580 041) Abrigada - VA Rua da Liberdade
description: Service station for motorhomes. Located at the fire station. Intermarket and petrol station nearby.

title: (2890-014) Alcochete -
description: Parking where we stayed one night without any difficulty. calm. 1 hour from Lisbon.

title: (2890) Alcochete -
description: Very nice place next to the beach and the park. I drove here at 2 at night because the other spot on park4night was very noisy on a Friday. That was a good decision.

title: (2670-339) Loures - EN 250 Quinta Casal da Pipa
title_short: (2670-339) Loures - EN 250 Quinta Casal da Pipa
description: Ein bescheidener Ort, um die Nacht ohne Probleme zu verbringen. Es ist im Park auf dem Festland.

title: (2890-167) Alcochete - 185 Avenida Infante D.João
description: Beach overlooking Lisbon. A beach bar, showers and foot baths, sports equipment and free wi fi. Place where to park the motorhome 50 m from the beach. I think there will be no problem with the overnight stay. This area should be avoided from the 9th to the 16th of August, at least for parking or overnight accommodation of vehicles that can cause traffic problems, since at that time the festivities of the land (parties of Barrete Verde) take place. Moreover, they can park in the surroundings and go to the party by other means, since they are very beautiful and traditional parties. In June, the parrot festival takes place on this beach.

title: () Alcochete - 237 N119
description: Close by night! Hyper ample free parking hyper Freeport shopping center. Without service.

title: (2120-013) Salvaterra de Magos -
description: Great place between a field and a river. Ideal for a day or a night in the middle of nature. 10 min walk from a small restaurant and boat trip along the river. Very beautiful sunset.

title: (2890-167) Alcochete - 92 Rua das Descobertas
description: Alcochete, Portugal, Free Park,, No Service Area

title: (2870-145) Alcochete - Unnamed Road
description: More natural car park than the others in the city, on the banks of the river next to the marsh area, view of the capital. No amenities, very good internet network for telecommuting... No one in the off-season, perfect for a quiet night or two.

title: (2890) Alcochete - 259 Rua Cerradinho da Praia
description: Parking near park at night closed, safe place for van

title: (2890-532) Alcochete - Praia das Salinas
description:
Perfect to stand here overlooking the bridge, sandy bottom but lots of firm spots. Access is a bit bumpy for a very short distance but. We are standing here with a length of 8m, no problem.
Perfect for a night or two free standing. Beach, sand, peace and view. What more do you want.

title: (2620-091) Póvoa de Santo Adrião - 4 Largo Igreja
title_short: (2620-091) Póvoa de Santo Adrião - 4 Largo Igreja
description: It’s a small dirt parking spot with a laundromat across the street. The wash-salon has free wifi and TV available. Clean and well kept. There is also a machine inside to change money. Not suitable for large CC only vans.

title: (2120) Salvaterra de Magos - 3 Largo dos Avieiros
title_short: (2120) Salvaterra de Magos - 3 Largo dos Avieiros
description: Quiet corner at the water's edge at the port of Escaroupim, flat, picnic table in the shade, ideal for spending the night in peace.

description: Campervan Area Ecopark da Serra de São Julião

title: (2665-258) Malveira -
description: Parking area in a really quiet location. Just to stay overnight in a small town.

title: (1800) Lisboa - Estrada de São Cornélio
description: Parking near the cemetery, perfect for overnight, very quiet, in the morning park cars from the offices, is 15 minutes walk from the oceanarium. In the park of the nations.

title: (2665) Venda do Pinheiro -
description: The Brico-Marché hardware store offers 907 Campinggaz cylinders. Super helpful and friendly staff.

title: (2665) Malveira - N8
description: Camper maintenance site. Car washing, vacuuming, black water, gray water. Supermarket is next door and you can park! Recommended! :)

title: (1990-108) Lisboa - 2.03 Alameda dos Oceanos

title: (1990-221) Lisboa - 308 Passeio Adamastor
description: A laundromat on the corner, see pictures for prices

title: (2120) Salvaterra de Magos - 107 N114
description: Self-service weighbridge.

title: (1700) Lisboa - Rua A
description: Parking P6 long duration. Underground and open air. We stayed here for 2 nights. Ideal to party in Lisbon without worrying about our van and return early in the morning with the first metro or night bus 208 leaving Cais de Sobré. Toilets and catering at the airport (3 min walk)

title: (2565) Runa - 99 Rua da Liberdade
description: Brand new car park.

title: (1700-111) Lisboa - Av. Berlim
description: P3 guarded car park with flat and shaded spaces. No problem with our 3m high van. 15 euros for 24 hours. Metro for Lisbon 5 minutes walk from the car park for 1.50e. Beware of many thefts in broad daylight of motorhomes on car parks at 3 euros without surveillance.

title: (2665-201) Malveira - 29A Rua 25 de Abril
description:
Park to visit Malveira. Free park.
Safe for night near resident homes.
Limited to 3500kg.

title: (2070-516) Valada - 55 Rua Primeiro de Maio
description: Very large parking at the edge of the Tagus, free with toilets, damage showers do not work, many picnic tables, children's game, bar at the small port next door, quiet, easy access, to be recommended ...

title: (2665-228) Malveira - 14 Largo da Feira
description: Ample public and free parking, except on market days. Inclined and with paved floor, in the center of the town. However, there is nothing interesting to see

title: (1950-074) Lisboa - 19 Rua Norte Júnior
description: Area where parking is tolerated by RV’s and caravans, near bus station

name: Parque de Campismo do Escaroupim

description: Quiet not far from the river. Restorantje in camping. Good price. Decently.

title: (1950) Lisboa - R Cintura do Porto

title: (1750) Lisboa - 5 Rua S

title: (1950-011) Lisboa - WC Avenida Santo Condestável

title: (2890) Samouco - 15 Rua da Praia

title: (2620-267) Ramada - 3 Rua Comandante Sacadura Cabral
description: Stayed here and it was fine. The street is noisy but the place is free and also good for visiting Lisbon.

title: (2675-369) Odivelas - 18 Rua Augusto Alexandre Jorge

title: (1950-116) Lisboa - 108 Rua Engenheiro Ferreira Dias

title: (2890) Samouco - Acesso à Área de Serviço de Alcochete
title_short: (2890) Samouco - Acesso à Área de Serviço de Alcochete

The bathrooms close from 22: 00-7: 30. You can park next to the showers and bathrooms. Possibility of refilling water from the gas station. ideal for a night. In the vicinity there is nothing special.

title_short: (2070-397) Pontével - 13 Largo do Rio da Fonte

Maintenance area next to the Pontével river beach.

description: Amazing view, quiet, WC on the  restaurant

title: (2130) Santo Estevão - Unnamed Road
description: Small location along a road with little traffic (cul de sac). We spent the night here, and only two cars passed. Pleasant location and peaceful night, but without any service.

title: (1950-242) Lisboa - J Rua Pereira Henriques
description: Big parking lot across the road from bars. Has a lot of space, a little noisy on the weekends, but overall, seems ok. 5 other motorhomes parked

title: (2130) Santo Estevão - Rua Direita
description: A very quiet place to spend the night. In my opinion much better than the other place around here, since it is not the access road to a property. Only in the morning did a car come by. Please leave it as clean as you found it!

title: (2125-120) Marinhais - Estrada Nacional 367
description: Intermarché motorhome service point. Free water and dumping station. Cheap diesel station and large selection of gas bottles available.

title: (1700-111) Lisboa - 112 Avenida do Brasil
description: From 9:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. the parking lot is chargeable and can be paid for a maximum of 4 hours. Free at night and weekends. Stayed two nights as I was attending a festival at the RCA Club. I was in the center of Lisbon in about 20 minutes by bike. Not suitable for vehicles longer than 6m!

title: (2665-001) Azueira - 10 N8
description: A drinking water fountain on the edge of the N8

title: (2120-194) Foros de Salvaterra -
description: Nice sandy spot by the lake and with trees for shade. Some level spots. Nice and quiet, the road is not busy at night. Enjoyed a nice peaceful rest here.

name: Le Jasmin Etoilé
title: (2070-352) Le Jasmin Etoilé
description: 2-3 places for camper or caravan. Water, electricity, cassette and gray water evacuation, sink. Shops nearby: grocery store, fruit and vegetables, bar. Once a week: butcher and fishmonger. Cash machine. Pets accepted. If booking a minimum of one week, we take you to the supermarket for free for your purchases. Possibility to rent a kitchen tent with two pieces of furniture and an induction hob for a minimum of one week.

title: (2550) Ariero - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful panoramic views, 600m up, the highest point nearby by far, you can enjoy the sunrise and sunset next to the 18th century chapel, an old point of pilgrimage that still attracts visitors today. It's right next to a vast amount of antennas (ref highest point for miles), doesn't bother us but It'd look nicer without them. Opportunity to hike or bike to surrounding areas, no shade or services, easy road access, lots of space with relatively flat parking.

title: (2870-087) Montijo - 135 Avenida Dom Afonso v
description: A full service laundry even with ironing. As of now, free parking “behind” the building

name: Parque de Campismo Rural da Serra de Montejunto
title: (2580) Parque de Campismo Rural da Serra de Montejunto
title_short: (2580) Parque de Campismo Rural da Serra de Montejunto
description: Very nice camping place in nature. We must arrive till 5 PM. I spent just one day because i was finishing my August holidays. I will return as soon as possible.

title: (2550) - Unnamed Road
description: End of the world for autonomous motorhomes, parking in the mountains, 2 tracks of 3 km of nature walk. Close to a campsite (not closed in winter). Windmills. Wind turbines on the horizon. Few telephone network, wifi at the campsite and free wifi Cadaval and office which serves as a tourist office.

title: (1600) Lisboa - Rua César de Oliveira
description: It is a good place to park and sleep. During the week, there is noise to be near the highway.

title: (1700-031) Lisboa - 15 Avenida Almirante Gago Coutinho
description: Large car park directly at the bus and metro stops. Ideal for learning about Lisbon. The parking spaces are large enough for campers. The car park is operated 24 hours a day with lighting. We didn't spend the night ourselves, but saw other motorhomes that spent the night here.

title: (2870-327) Montijo - 2870 Via Circular do Montijo
description: Repsol gas station with good LPG price. You can also buy a Propane Bottle here.

title: (2565-814) - 1 Travessa da Casa Paroquial
description: Rest stop with a free park next to the main church. Space is a little tight for large motorhomes.

title: (1900-284) Lisboa - 56 Rua Simões Telhadas
description: Located in centre off an old neigborhood in green area. high ground with view to the largest cemitery in Portugal.

title: (1900-159) Lisboa - 108 Estrada de Chelas
description: We have arrived late at night and we have spent the night here with our van, without any problem. It is a dead end street that ends up being a parking lot with grass. Above there is a small park, and below the train passes. At night there is almost no movement and one sleeps very peacefully. It has a bus stop nearby. In 20 minutes you are in the center.

title: (1649-028) Lisboa - MB Avenida Professor Egas Moniz
title_short: (1649-028) Lisboa - MB Avenida Professor Egas Moniz
description: University parking Saba, paying with guard during the day. Less than 10 minutes by subway from downtown. Metro mouth just outside the car park. Ability to stay more than 24h.

title: (1900) Lisboa - 282 Rua Capela
description: Free parking near cemetery for camper vans. Walking distance from city centre. My car stayed here 5 nights in December with no problems. No services.

title: (1600-007) Lisbon - 12d Avenida Álvaro Pais
description: Parking on the street with slots of a bigger size. Payed by parking meter. Very near the train and metro station (Entrevampos) and bus stops to visit the center. There’s shade by the afternoon.

title: (1900-319) Lisboa - 40 Rua da Manutenção
description: I have been here without any problem. I felt safe leaving the van while in the city center. 15 'with the bike. A 3 'walk away there is a Lidl where I have seen that the parking lot shared with a pharmacy is often open so 1-2 vans were there at night. Just behind the BP gas station there is a little street where I did see 2 motorhomes staying overnight but as the street is very dark at night I don't dare park there. Maybe it's okay. At night I slept peacefully without any problem. The place where I put it would advise it for vans and not caravans. For motorhomes I think it's better just behind the BP gas station

title: (1000) Lisboa - 56A Avenida Defensores de Chaves
description: Street parking paying from 09:00 to 19:00. Free in the evening from 19:00 to 09:00. Somewhat noisy place to sleep with traffic until about 23:00. But with incognito van/camper nobody will notice. Many similar places in this area can be found if you arrive at night. Day time is super busy

title: (2565) Maxial - 1 Rua Bartolomeu Perestrelo
description: Quiet place in a dead end street in front of it are some parking spaces. I had a quiet night. At the edge of the forest where you can go for a nice walk. Playground is there too.

title: (2870) Atalaia - 52 Rua dos Círios
description: Quiet parking for one night behind the church. So hard to find a place in the area. The church bells start ringing at 7:00 a.m. every 15 minutes.

title: (2870) Atalaia - 2127 N4
description: Large empty parking lot at night. we spent the night there without any worries you have trash cans available.

title: (2870) Atalaia - Escadaria do Adro da Igreja
title_short: (2870) Atalaia - Escadaria do Adro da Igreja
description: Large quiet parking (we were alone) facing the church.  Behind houses but not far from the road.  Away but not isolated so perfect for a night of rest.  Wc closed at night

title: (2715-311) Almargem do Bispo - 4 Largo do Jogo da Bola
title_short: (2715-311) Almargem do Bispo - 4 Largo do Jogo da Bola
description: Small Vespa gas station with bathrooms, shopping, cafe and bakery.

title: (1000-098) Lisbon - 171 Avenida Almirante Reis
description: Open-air city car park, monitored and paying with reception, places reserved for long vehicles. We left our van there for 2 nights without a problem, we didn't sleep there.

title: (2870) Montijo - 79 Rua Miguel Pais
description: Car park right by the river and at Montijo downtown. Restaurants, bars and other services close by.

title: (1600-019) Lisboa - A Rua Portugal Durão
description: Free overnight & weekends. Quite quiet, occasional traffic. Nice angled spaces easy to park. Slight hill. Trees for shade. 2 min walk from swimming pool for shower (R. Cardeal Mercier, 1600-136 Lisboa) and 10 min walk from launderette (R. Jorge Afonso 13A, 1600-216 Lisboa)

title: (2870) Montijo - D Estrada do Seixalinho
description: Huge parking near ferry terminal to Lisbon and military airport.

title: (2580) Alenquer - 14 Rua Principal
description: Small water fountain in the city. easy access. good jet for filling water hacks.

title: (1900) Lisboa - 24 Rua Lopes
description:
Little vacant lot accessable by the church car park. 
Suitable for a camper van rather than a fully fledged motorhome.
We stayed one night. 
Flat ground. Litter everywhere.
A bit of a shady area. 
Someone in a car near us was flicking their lighter on and off in the late hours of the evening, heating up something nondescript...
Don't expect to feel particularly safe. Free parking in near the centre is hard to find.

title: (1170-009) Lisboa - 88 Rua Castelo Branco Saraiva
description: Calm place at night. Free from night Friday til Sunday at night, pay rest week. Good place.

title: (1170) Lisboa - 61 Avenida Mouzinho de Albuquerque
description: Place to sleep or leave the free van. Sand floor To go to the center of Lisbon, take the bus 706 right in front and at 4-5 stops you will be dropped off at the Santa Apolonia train station. There are metro and buses that take you downtown. From the train station to the center there is a 15min walk to an area of ​​bars and shops. Gas station nearby, at about 150-200m.

title: (2560-295) Torres Vedras - 1 Rua António Augusto Cabral
title_short: (2560-295) Torres Vedras - 1 Rua António Augusto Cabral
description: Quiet parking in the limits of a small city called Torres Vedras, no need to pay, but not a place where you can bring your table and chairs

title: (1170-147) Lisboa - 8B Rua Professor Celestino da Costa
title_short: (1170-147) Lisboa - 8B Rua Professor Celestino da Costa
description: Very quiet to park within the city, near a school (AM noise). It is leveled for motorhomes.

title: (1500-313) Lisboa - Unnamed Road
description: Estadio da Luz car park. With the toilets and the barrier. Close to the metro.

name: Quinta Lusco-Fusco
title: (2890) Quinta Lusco-Fusco
description: Quinta Lusco-Fusco is a private rural farm lets stay overnight for travelers by van, tent, bike, backpack, camping under the stars, in the shade of the cork oak, listening to the birds, seeing the farm animals. It is just 30 minutes from Lisbon. Only cold shower. Call before arrival.

title: (1100) Lisboa - 2 Rua de Santa Apolónia
description: Parking a bit away from the city centre, a 15-minute walk to the District of alfama close to the train station a. no service but not negligible to Park! We stayed for the day but sleep opportunity but a lot of noise because of the great axes

title: (1170) Lisboa - T1 Rua Frei Manuel do Cenáculo
title_short: (1170) Lisboa - T1 Rua Frei Manuel do Cenáculo
description: Good parking lot for small vans. Very quiet at night. Free from Friday evening till Monday morning.

address.street: T1 Rua Frei Manuel do Cenáculo

title: (1675-180) Pontinha - n5b Rua José Saramago
description: Parking lot next to the Fontinha metro station, large park with several stopped caravans, during the night quite silent...

title: (1170) Lisboa - 3 Avenida General Roçadas
description: Calm and quiet parking to spend the night. Free from 7 p.m. to 9 a.m. the next day. Small restaurants nearby. I recommend the Nepalé restaurant which is 300m to the left when leaving the car park under the arches of a building.

title: (2870) Montijo - E90
description: Parking at the Forum Montijo shopping center. With all the facilities of a shopping center a few steps away (like the Continente supermarket and pharmacies).

title: (2070) Cartaxo - 3 Rua Vale Mosqueira
description: Parque Pesados ​​- Free parking close to Cartaxo

title: (2070-107) Cartaxo - 40 Rua Manuel Bernardo das Neves
title_short: (2070-107) Cartaxo - 40 Rua Manuel Bernardo das Neves
description: Parking day and night, very quiet and quiet area, low inclined floor safe at 100 meters from PSP, having a very nice coffee  "The Kabulas 2 " Bakery bread fresh at 200 meters is the Intermarche to 500 meters

title: (1500-313) Lisbon - 27 Rua Doutor João Couto
description: For us the perfect parking lot to visit Lisbon. It's outside the environmental zone (we have an old bus) and we felt safe. The parking lot is behind a barrier. The blue line metro is directly opposite. You could have spent the night there.

title: (2560) Torres Vedras - Estrada Nó de Ligação A8
title_short: (2560) Torres Vedras - Estrada Nó de Ligação A8
description: LPG / GPL gas station. Has adapter for German gas tanks (does NOT fill gas bottles). Additionally washing machines and dryers.

title: (1500) Lisboa -
description: It is a parking lot on the street. At the beginning of it, parking is diagonal but a few meters later it is horizontal, so we were able to park our 7-meter AC. We spent the night in peace. It is 5 minutes from the metro and 15 minutes from the Plaza de España. I think it's payable during the week, but since we went on a weekend we didn't have to pay.

title: (1100) Lisboa -
description: Free parking on the street next to a main road. We only park for a visit, we don't spend the night, the area is quiet but the road and the train can be annoying to sleep. The area is completely flat.

title: (2560) Torres Vedras - Barro
description: Municipal Motorhome Parking very well located with all services for free, no reserved parking spaces, you can park on any spot, nice green park and dog park just in front, all connected via a cycling lane, many supermarkets and a fast-food around the corner.

title: (1170) Lisboa - 76A Rua da Bombarda
description: Parking place near Lidl. It used to be a paid parking, but now gates always open. Quiet.

title: (1170) Lisboa - 9 Rua Maria da Fonte
description: Parking at the foot of a building, flat, near the city center (about 1 km).  We stayed here on a Friday night in August, there was little overnight stay.  There is a cafe and a grocery store across the street, Lidl supermarket just above.  No convenience. (Translated by Google)

title: (1070) Lisboa - 22 Rua Marquês de Fronteira
description: Paid parking, 3 euros per day. During the day it may be full, pay from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m.

title: (1070-051) Lisboa - 39 Rua Marquês de Fronteira
description: Next to Jardim Amália Rodrigues & Parque Eduardo VII with amazing view. Can recommend the Linha d’Agua cafe. There’s an outdoor fitness workout park nearby & lots of places to eat within walking distance. Next to the prison! Near fairly busy road.

title: (1100) Lisboa - 73B Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
description: Without service, noisy during the day, but 1minute from the station (with supermarket), subway, bus. Do not take the P24h, but go under the building (U-turn at the end of the road). Give a small room to the guy who "helps" to park, you will feel safer (seems to be customary on this car park). During the week, empty at the end of the afternoon. I stayed here for 3 nights without a problem

title: (1500-235) Lisboa - 3A Rua Doutor João Couto
description: Paid parking from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m. Very close to the shopping center (5 minutes walk) and between the houses. Rather for short motorhomes and vans.

title: (1100-475) Lisboa - Campo de Santa Clara
description: Very central and it’s quiet at Night. It’s one of the rare free and flat parking lots of Lisboa. In the morning you probably get woken up by a siren of the small military base (or maybe school) next to the parking area. At the daytime you can use the toilets of cafe clara.

title: (2560-683) Torres Vedras - Rua Villenave d`Ornon
description: Good and quiet park to stay the night or the day, next to the firemen and the police. Only parking, without services. Great to walk in the city. Very good to park during carnival.

title: (1500-080) Lisboa - 4 Largo General Joaquim José Machado
title_short: (1500-080) Lisboa - 4 Largo General Joaquim José Machado
description: Day and Night parking

title: (1100-470) Lisboa - 220B Campo de Santa Clara
description:
Free parking on a hilly street, we arrived in the morning and the nearby car parks were already full. This street is not paid, but the one below it already has a parking meter and is a yellow zone. Perfect place to go for a walk downtown through the Alfama neighborhood.
CAREFUL! On Tuesdays and Saturdays there is a market and you cannot park.

title: (2560-280) Torres Vedras - 6A Rua Luís Augusto Albino
title_short: (2560-280) Torres Vedras - 6A Rua Luís Augusto Albino
description: Nice place to wash clothes, there are parking lots in front where you can park your van

title: (1100-032) Lisboa - 116 Campo de Santa Clara
description: It is not a place to sleep since it seems like a troubled neighborhood, but to leave the car or the van during the day, it is quite cool. I spent the whole day outside with no problem. If you know how to read you will not have any problem with the market (Tuesday and Saturday)

title: (2560-256) Torres Vedras - 2 Rua António Alves Ferreira
title_short: (2560-256) Torres Vedras - 2 Rua António Alves Ferreira
description: LPG Auchan

title: (2715-727) Montelavar - 14 Largo do Rossio
description: Public parking space across the street from a church. It only fits smaller vans though (max.6m) approx. 400ms away is a water fountain with drinking water, a small super market and a tiny Café. You can do nice hike to a small waterfall

title: (1100-341) Lisboa - 45 Praça Martim Moniz
description: Parking day and night guarded (video surveillance) height 2.3m.

title: (2640-317) Igreja Nova - 135 N9
description:
A small picknick spot. many tables and lots of shade under the trees. Small toilet building and a working watertap.
Toilets are of French type (hole in ground) 
Trashcans available at street front.
Many stone bbq spots available, bring your own steel grill grate though.

title: (2125) Marinhais - IC3
description: Parking next to a very quiet and spacious gas station.

title: (2070) Cartaxo - Circular Urbana
description: Super parking for the day and the night very quiet next to a stadium no worries there no service nearby.

title: (1070-025) Lisboa - Unnamed Road
description: Parking at the station near the old aqueduct and the park. A beautiful, relatively quiet and convenient place to spend the day in Lisboa. If you park against the wall between the trees, it creates a space for privacy.

title: (2070-085) Cartaxo - 2 Rua do Progresso
description: Easy parking. But right next to Lidl.

title: (2715-719) Montelavar - 18 Rua Professor Rosa Génio Alves
title_short: (2715-719) Montelavar - 18 Rua Professor Rosa Génio Alves
description: Village water point. Super clean, several taps

title: (2560) Torres Vedras - R. São Gonçalo de Lagos
title_short: (2560) Torres Vedras - R. São Gonçalo de Lagos
description: Large gravelled car park. No motorhome ban. No service. Calm aspect during the day. Lots of parked cars. Easy access even to large vehicles.

title: (2560) Torres Vedras - Barro
description: Very good and quiet park. Next to the Expotorres. There are no services, there is a bar and other shopping areas around. A 5-minute walk from the City Center. Great for visiting the city, the Castle and other attractions. Very good to park during Carnival. Great park area near Expotorres. No services. Only parking. Quiet and near by the town center, 5 minutes walk.

title: (2560-616) Torres Vedras - 20 Rua das Linhas de Torres
title_short: (2560-616) Torres Vedras - 20 Rua das Linhas de Torres
description: Fountain with drinking water
